content.text:
You have 5 recent emails. Here are some details for the unread ones:

1. From: Vercel AI SDK Team
   Subject: AI SDK: New features, examples, and roadmap
   Received: 2025-09-25 09:45
   Importance: High

2. From: Guillermo Rauch
   Subject: Next.js Conf 2025 — keynotes, workshops, and launches
   Received: 2025-09-25 08:55
   Importance: High

3. From: GitHub
   Subject: [repo] 3 issues assigned to you
   Received: 2025-09-25 07:10
   Importance: Medium

Would you like me to read the full content of any email or help with something specific?

The content of the email from Guillermo Rauch with the subject "Next.js Conf 2025 — keynotes, workshops, and launches" is as follows:

"Thank you for taking the time to review this message. It contains a detailed update related to the subject line, including background context, current status, and any actions that may be required. The intention is to provide clear, practical information you can use immediately, without needing to track down additional references. Where relevant, we outline timelines, ownership, and potential risks to watch. If something needs attention, it is summarized plainly and repeated near the end. We also include helpful links or pointers to follow-up threads when applicable. Please reply if anything is unclear, if you need more depth, or if priorities have changed since the last update."

Would you like me to do anything else with this email?

I only have the email headers and brief details for the emails fetched. I can load the full content of email 3 (From: GitHub, Subject: [repo] 3 issues assigned to you) if you want. Would you like me to do that?

The email from GitHub with the subject "[repo] 3 issues assigned to you" contains the following message:

"Thank you for taking the time to review this message. It contains a detailed update related to the subject line, including background context, current status, and any actions that may be required. The intention is to provide clear, practical information you can use immediately, without needing to track down additional references. Where relevant, we outline timelines, ownership, and potential risks to watch. If something needs attention, it is summarized plainly and repeated near the end. We also include helpful links or pointers to follow-up threads when applicable. Please reply if anything is unclear, if you need more depth, or if priorities have changed since the last update."

If you want, I can help you with any specific details or actions related to this email.
